job.title: Full Stack Engineer
job.description: ltpgtWe are looking for a FullStack Senior Engineer who is proficient in React Python and DjangoltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtWho are weltstronggtltpgtltpgtWe are an industry leading technology company in the contenttocommerce space Our industry leading platform generates 15 Billion events per day and our active user base hits around 100 million per monthltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtWhats the jobltstronggtltpgtltpgtAs our newest software engineer you will be responsible for the development of our custom SDK and BackEnd Javascript code base This SDK is core to our platform and triggers all of their core productsltpgtltpgtYou will work extensively with React NPM webpack and Python while ensuring best practices participating in paired programming with other developers and much more to take our software to the next levelltpgtltpgtThis position is ideally suited for a strong generalist who has the ability to assess problems lead implementation and has the autonomy to self learn new technologiesltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtWhat are the required skills for the jobltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtProficiency in Javascript and JS PatternsltligtltligtDeep understanding of ReactltligtltligtExperience with modern frontend build pipelines and tools such as Babel WebpackltligtltligtExperience building APIs with Python and the Django frameworkltligtltligtExperience with cloud hosting GCP or AWSltligtltligtStrong understanding of how web applications work including APIs REST GraphQLltligtltligtYou can design and implement solutions that are efficient flexible and scalableltligtltulgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtWhy join our organizationltstronggtltpgtltpgtYou will solve complex and interesting problems related to distributed systems We are a high velocity shop and capable of implementing brand new software and services within two weeks Our deadlines are completely internal and not tied to our clientsltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtWe are a small team of like minded engineers and there will be no shortage of opportunities for project ownership and the ability to influence our technology stack This is a great opportunity for growth and to gain exposure to a number of new technologies that broaden your tool set We are not corporate and you will see you work in action immediatelyltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtOur head office is in NYC and we have other satellite offices across the US This position has the ability to be fullyremote or you can go on site at one of our offices whenever you please We work on Eastern Standard Time EST We are doing extremely well and plan to double in size within the next year with a heavy focus on developing our Engineering team Its a great time to join usltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtWhat is the compltstronggtltpgtltpgtWe offer a fully comprehensive compensation package and full suite of benefitsltpgtltulgtltligtBase Salary 135000  150000ltligtltligtStock OptionsltligtltligtMedical Dental Vision 401k among othersltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtIf working on a small team for an industry leading startup then please apply today or emailampnbspanareichenbachaverityteamcomltpgt
